name: ASCD
sampleDescriptions: Funding for federal K-12 education programs, specifically Title II of ESSA, in S. 3158 Senate FY19 Labor-HHS-Education Appropriations bill and House FY19 Labor-HHS-Education Appropriations bill.
Funding for federal K-12 education programs, specifically Title II of ESSA, in S. 3158 Senate FY19 Labor-HHS-Education Appropriations bill and House FY19 Labor-HHS-Education Appropriations bill.
Funding for federal K-12 education programs, specifically Title II of ESSA.
Increased funding for Every Student Succeeds Act Titles I, II, and IV and the Individuals with Disabilities Education Act (IDEA).
Increased funding and policy flexibility in response to Covid-19 pandemic.
